The [[w:New_Year|New Years]] sale is a large [[Marketplace]] sale in {{BE}} that occurs at the end of every year. When the sale is active, players can enjoy up to 75% discount in the marketplace, meaning they can enjoy cheaper [[World|worlds]], [[Add-on|Add-ons]], and more. They will need to spend less real money to buy [[Minecoin|Minecoins]] to purchase things in the marketplace.
